description: This source file defines a Flutter widget for the login screen of a finance tracker app. It manages user authentication input, displays a form for username and password, and handles navigation based on login success.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget responsible for rendering the login form and handling user authentication.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the form state, login process, and UI updates for LoginScreen.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login screen UI, including form fields, error messages, and navigation buttons.
